resources.string: There was an error loading word list.\nWord puzzle assistance may not work.

• Tap the icon to select an assist.
• You can add as many as you like.
• You can drag assist boxes around and rearrange them.
• Press and hold to delete assist boxes.
Rearranges letters to find other words.
Auto-complete words and finds words that fit patterns.
Look up words to see if they appear in this app\'s dictionary.
Be aware, very big words and phrases might take awhile to solve.
Choose if you want to add/remove a letter.

• Enter a word(s) or series of letters into the input to find its anagrams (spaces are ignored).
• 'CE' clears the input.
• 'Phrases Option' anagrams the input into two or more words.
• 'Sub words Option' allows words that don't use all the letters.
• 'Add letter' 
If set to +1, tries to anagram the input with an additional letter (anagrams 26 times, once for each letter of the alphabet).
If set to -1, anagrams the input by removing a letter (anagrams as many letters are in input).
• 'Change max/min' controls the words sizes when 'Phrases' or 'Sub words' is checked.
Question marks (?) indicate single unknown characters.\nAsterisks (*) mark any quantity of unknown characters.
"Fill In The Blanks search was cancelled."
Choose which letters are allowed to fill in any blanks. Does not affect any of the letters you entered, only new ones that are found.

\u2022Enter the letters you are certain of and (?) for single unknown letters, (*) for any amount of unknown letters.\n\u2022 \'CE\' clears the input.\n\u2022 \'Ignore certain letters\' you can choose to have the algorithm ignore certain letters when trying to add letters. Does NOT affect letters you entered into the input.
You can enter words/phrases/paragraphs all in one line or multiline. Note: The more words you enter and the larger they are, the faster it will solve.

"• Carefully enter the crypto input, it can be all on one line or multiple.
• Non-letters are skipped and will show up in the final answer. This allows you to enter entire passages complete with punctuation. The algorithm also preserves capital letters. Words are considered separated by spaces and newlines only.
• 'CE' clears the input. 
• It is normal for it to take a little while to solve.
You can enter a word to see if it appears in the internal lexicon or dictionary.
\u2022Enter a word you want to look up to see if it is in the internal lexicon/dictionary.\n\u2022 \'CE\' clears the input.

Developed by Hunter Wiesman

Please send feedback to "huntersmeadow@gmail.com"

I'd appreciate it. :)
Cannot start, word list failed to load.
"Cannot start, word list hasn't finished loading."
